Uses of Class
net.jini.jeri.ssl.SslServerEndpointImpl.SslServerConnection

  • Packages that use SslServerEndpointImpl.SslServerConnection 
    Package Description
    net.jini.jeri.ssl
    Provides implementations of Endpoint and ServerEndpoint that use TLS/SSL and HTTPS (HTTP over TLS/SSL) to support invocation constraints.
